extensionDescription.message: Save your discussions with ChatGPT directly into Notion!

errConnect.message: Connect yourself to Notion by clicking on the extension's icon.

index_errRegister.message: Please register a database in the settings

conflict_text.message: A page in your database holds the same name as this conversation

conflict_appendInfo.message: (Saves at the end of existing page)

conflict_rename.message: OR rename the conversation on the left menu

conflict_renameFromPin.message: OR choose a different page name upon saving

settings_slowSearch.message: Searching pages/DBs can be quite slow...

settings_noDBFound.message: No database found, this might be because Notion hasn't synced them with the integration yet.

settings_noUrlProperty.message: Add an URL property to this DB inside Notion to use it

settings_exampleDB.message: Here's an example database compatible with the extension

settings_errUnauthorized.message: Access was denied by Notion, please reload the extension (inside chrome://extensions/) or reinstall it (see FAQ)

dbsettings_explainer.message: Upon saving a chat, you'll be prompted to choose one of these tags for the newly created Notion page

dbsettings_noTags.message: This database doesn't have any tags (select/multiselect properties)

dbsettings_noOptions.message: This tag doesn't have any options, although you can save a discussion without choosing a tag

premium_desc.message: Unlock new features, get rid of ads and support development for $2 per month!

premium_key_activate_desc.message: Already have a key? Enter it here

premium_success.message: Thanks a lot for your support & purchase! Enjoy autosave and future features as much as you want!

premium_invalid.message: Verify the key you recieved in your email and try again

autosave_enabled.message: Autosave is enabled on this chat!

autosave_enabled_desc.message: You may need to enable it again after changing your Notion database's properties

autosave_wrongpage.message: Start a discussion with ChatGPT and reload the page to use autosave

autosave_error.message: An error occurred while saving the last message

autosave_errmsg_unauthorized.message: Access to your Notion workspace was denied

autosave_errmsg_object_not_found.message: Couldn't find the Notion database, either because it was deleted or the extension isn't allowed to access it

autosave_errmsg_internal_server_error.message: There was an error on Notion's side

history_desc.message: ChatGPT to Notion will save your complete conversation history. This process may take some time.

history_desc_trial.message: Upgrade your premium trial to be able to save your complete conversation history.

history_dontClose.message: Please don't close your browser while the save is occuring.

notion_gptWork.message: ChatGPT work, expand it before saving for it to show here

notion_dalleExplainer.message: DALL-E images can't be saved directly without hosting them outside of OpenAI's servers first, which won't be done for privacy reasons. You can download them from your conversation with ChatGPT and add them here later.

eco_desc.message: Eco-friendly mode allows us to plant a tree whenever you visit a partner website, while respecting your privacy and not changing anything with your web experience.

update_heading.message: ChatGPT to Notion just got an update! ðŸŽ‰

update_major.message: There are some major changes, please read this page.

update_changelog_link.message: Read the changelog for every update here

update_changelog_fixes_1.message: Improper handling of prompts with multiple line jumps

update_changelog_fixes_2.message: Edge case where pin save would fail on a brand new conversation

update_eco_1.message: When I first created ChatGPT to Notion, I wasn't at all expecting it to become the success that it is today! I am incredibly grateful for having the opportunity to bring something useful to tens of thousands of people. However, as I kept going through with my studies, I've been lacking time to maintain the extension and develop alternatives for other LLMs as much as I wanted to.

update_eco_2.message: As a way to keep myself motivated to work on this project and to sustain myself through my studies, I have implemented a premium subscription that I've been wanting to get rid of ever since. Being fully aware of the fact that having a large platform is a rare occurence, I want to be as positive as possible. That's why I'm partnering up with the team at allcolibri to give ChatGPT to Notion the opportunity to also be a net positive for the environment.

update_eco_3.message: Eco-friendly mode is a compltetely optional feature that I've been working on implementing. When visiting a partner website, a portion of the revenue generated from your visit will be used to plant trees and to remunerate the extension's development. If this partnership proves to be successful,

update_eco_4.message: I will be using this revenue stream to make the extension features free for everyone.

update_eco_5.message: Thank you for your interest in ChatGPT to Notion,

update_eco_enabled.message: Eco-friendly mode is enabled, congrats! ðŸŒ³
